channel.title: Something to look forward to
channel.description: I have come upon inspiration for a games center. the games center is planned to have 3 games so far that are meant for competition and will have more later on. the games are sand pillar climb, lava hopping, and ice run. sand pillar climb will have 4 spot next to eachother where players will jump and place sand below them and climb 20-35m high to a platform, which when the first player reachs it and step onto it, it will open the four spots to a torch that will break all the sand pillars leading to the death of the other 3 players who lost, unless the manage a tie. lava run is planned so far to have a 23m length where players will hop from various cobble stone blocks that will go up and down the lava pool with each one at different intervals. the ice run will have players dash accross an icy obsticle course at an undetermined length racing each-other to the end while dodging object on the way. if a person would like to help me create this to hasten the progress, just pm me ingame while i am on.

item.title: Something to look forward to
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

sounds cool ill help when i get a computer 0.0

also, for the ice, i recomend silk+fortune.
[/quote]

Fortune does nothing for ice[/quote]

i did not know. :I

item.title: Something to look forward to
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

snow will probably be for the walls, but i need ICE for the floor so i can create a slippery speedy race (you run faster and jump farther on ice, but slip around) i think i’m gonna need about 5 stacks of ICE, so i can make about a ±64m race. i also hope to add ice obstacle you have to jump over and avoid icesickles. also, i had an idea for a water slide ride. (it will go up, down, and around and through stuff.)

also, for the ice, i recomend silk+fortune.

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’ll go and collect and craft snow(?) blocks if you wish, do you have any idea on the numbers you need? The reason i put a question mark there is because i’m not sure if you mean ice or snow, i’m not even sure if you can craft ice. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Something to look forward to
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

It’s already being made, though slowly. Atm its just a tedious task of collecting cobble, turning it into stone bricks and placing it. A grand total of 28.000 stone bricks was needed lol.
What Im building is this:

Jedi_Temple_voor_de_vernietiging.png1680×944

The games arena will be located inside of it.

http://www.moparcraft.net/worldmap/?worldname=world&mapname=surface&zoom=4&x=-96.97880996520206&y=64&z=421.33046064453725

Read full topic

item.title: Something to look forward to
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Well everything below ground is intended for resources e.g farms. The 1st level of my temple will be the lobby/hallways/stairs, wich will be 140x140 and 16 blocks high, also a spleef arena will be located in the center on the 1st level. Each level above will be 8 in height, is that enough for whatever games you had in mind?

Read full topic

item.title: Something to look forward to
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:3, topic:450553”]Actually I already was thinking of adding spleef and several other games to my temple project, plenty of room for that considering its 150x150.

Ps the games I had in mind are spleef, endergolf(try to throw an enderpearl in a hole while avoiding traps), and a game that Id like to call “burn you mofo”, wich purpose is to light eachother on fire.[/quote]
well since i have not officially started on it, is it ok if i build my 3 games in your temple, possibly more games that come to my head? i was considering just building a 40x40 area and build it underground and above, but if we can place all our games into one area that would be best in my opinion.

Read full topic
